mapper.sql: group_id, dict_value, group_name, dict_name_cn, dict_name_en, modify_time, modifier, filler1, filler2, filler3, filler4
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_dict
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict (group_id, dict_value, group_name, dict_name_cn, dict_name_en, modify_time, modifier, filler1, filler2, filler3, filler4) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filler1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filler2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filler3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filler4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
